page.title: 05BICYCLES IN CAMBRIDGE.
page.content: ALMOST EVERYONE WHO LIVES IN{CAMBRIDGE OWNS A "BIKE",THEY ARE ECONOMICAL AND CHEAP AND THE AREA IS VERY FLAT. STUDENTS WHO COME HERE USE THEM SO THERE MUST BE THOUSANDS OF THEM. VISITORS DRIVING IN TOWN MUST FIND IT DIFFICULT AND TEDIOUS,THE ROADS ARE VERY NARROW AND MANY HAVE SPECIAL CYCLE LANES.IN THE RUSH HOUR THE ROADS ARE CROWDED WITH BICYCLES,BUSES AND CARS. IN THE SUMMER MANY FOREIGN STUDENTS ATTEND THE ENGLISH LANGUAGE SCHOOLS IN THE CITY AND THEY ADD TO THE CONFUSION BY NOT OBEYING THE HIGHWAY CODE.THEY CAN BE EASILY SPOTTED ON THEIR HIRED BIKES,BLUE FOR BOYS AND PINK FOR GIRLS. MANY INHABITANTS OF THE CITY WOULD RATHER USE THEIR BIKES THAN CARS IN TOWN AS CONGESTION AND PARKING CAN BE A NIGHTMARE.
